column4: hello does anybody happen to know if there is an application out there to help me pick hex colors for html
kcoloredit or kcolorchoser (both kde apps, tho)
leo_away:hmm some kde apps work on gmome
i think ill give them a try thank you very much
all of them work but you'll need qt
if you are short on ram loading gnome libraries and kde libraries might be an issue
and installing 50mb of libraries for an app might not be appealing to you... other than that go for it
i have gnome installed on top on kubuntu with gdm as the default display manager
there is an app called gcolor2 in the repos
your the bomb diggety... can i say bomb in here without gettin raided
